Maven Application Plugin

application:distribute

Full name:

net.sf.beezle.maven.plugins:application:1.4-SNAPSHOT:distribute

Description:

Distributes application files.

Attributes:

  • Requires a Maven project to be executed.

Required Parameters

Name Type Since Description
distribute String - Comma separated list of targets. E.g. ssh://root@pumama.schlund.de/home/clustercontrol/launcher

Optional Parameters

Name Type Since Description
backup String - Base name for backup file. If not specified, no backup will be created
dir FileNode - Directory where to place the Launch Script and the executable Jar file. Usually, there's no need to change the default value, which is target.
lockfile String - Pattern to search root directory of the respective distribute node for lock files. Distribution is aborted if the pattern matches one or more files.
name String - Name for the generated application file.

Parameter Details

backup:

Base name for backup file. If not specified, no backup will be created
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: No

dir:

Directory where to place the Launch Script and the executable Jar file. Usually, there's no need to change the default value, which is target.
  • Type: net.sf.beezle.sushi.fs.file.FileNode
  • Required: No
  • Expression: ${project.build.directory}

distribute:

Comma separated list of targets. E.g. ssh://root@pumama.schlund.de/home/clustercontrol/launcher
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: Yes

lockfile:

Pattern to search root directory of the respective distribute node for lock files. Distribution is aborted if the pattern matches one or more files.
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: No

name:

Name for the generated application file.
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: No
  • Expression: ${project.artifactId}
